AntV 是蚂蚁金服全新一代数据可视化解决方案，致力于提供一套简单方便、专业可靠: AntV is a new generation of data visualization solution of Ant Financial. We provide a best practice of data visualization with simplicity and convenience, profession and reliability, and infinite possibilities.
L7 发布新版本，让地图动起来！: L7 has published the new viewsion!

大量产品实践之上，提供绘图引擎、完备图形语法，专业设计规范。: We provide rendering engines, complete grammar of graphics, and professional design standards for plenty of practice products.

g2plot 是开箱即用、易于配置、具有良好视觉和交互体验的通用统计图表库。: g2plot is an interactive and responsive charting library based on the grammar of graphics.
配置项优化精简，仅需几行代码轻松生成图表: Generating high quality statistical charts through a few lines of code.
即使你不懂可视化或者设计小白，也能制作优雅、标准的统计图表: Even though you are not an expert in data visualization and design, you still can create elegant as well as standard charts as you want by using g2plot.
保证图表在任何显示尺寸、任何数据状态下的可读性: The responsive ablity of g2plot guarantee your chart's readability in any display space and data status.
